item.title: Tap Interfaces and Linux Bridge
item.description: In the previous blog of this seriesÂ we saw that using Linux bridge we can connect a virtual Ethernet port of a VM to the physical Ethernet port of the hypervisor server. Let us now focus a bit more on these virtual ports to see what happens behind the scenes to make virtual networking actually work. Physical vs. Virtual Networking The network data traffic is handled by the physical Ethernet ports on physical machines.
